sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Military Personnel Cellular Phone Contract Termination Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Military Personnel Cellular Phone Contract Termination Act.

sections.heading: Termination of cellular phone contract without penalty
sections.text: Any service member who enters military service, or the spouse of that service member, may terminate, without penalty, a cellular phone contract by giving notice via e-mail or regular mail to an address specified by the cellular telephone compan

sections.heading: Effective date of termination. Termination of the cellular phone contract shall not be effective until:
sections.text: Effective date of termination. Termination of the cellular phone contract shall not be effective until:

sections.heading: Violation. A violation of this Act constitutes a civil rights violation under the Illinois Human Rights Act
sections.text:
All proceeds from the collection of any civil penalty
imposed under this Section shall be deposited into the Illinois Military Family Relief Fund.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
